title: Snowflake Reports Strong Sales Growth
sub_head: The data-cloud company saw product revenue more than double in most recent quarter
body:
Snowflake Inc.â€™s revenue more than doubled in the latest period and the cloud-computing-services company issued a bullish outlook, cheering investors.
The Montana-based company, which went public last year and has yet to reach profitability, posted revenue of $334.4 million on Wednesday to generate a net loss of $154.9 million, beating Wall Street expectations.
